name: ArcticFriendship
description:
Peng and Koda are two great friends, they live in the Arctic with their families. Global warming has caused an accident that has separated Koda the bear from his loved ones, and only his penguin friend can help. Put together what the neglect of nature has separated in this icy adventure! 

Use: 
*Left Ctrl to swap character 
*Left and Right arrow to move 
*Space to Jump
*Down arrow to special move
*Esc to pause & setup 

Option keys
Return: resume level
R: restart game
Q: quit game
T: toglle music
